Lines.Speaker: Yuu
Lines.Speech: Look Scull, up ahead! I see a faint light.
[i]Looking further ahead, you do in fact see a faint light. Hope rises as you remember that these crystals glow like the Sun.

Lines.Speaker: GLADOS
Lines.Speech: Wow nice one, she saw some light with her eyes. Sensed the light several minutes back, thought it was pretty obvious.

Lines.Speaker: Agent Scully
Lines.Speech: Enough pouting Glados. Alright team, head on to that light. Expect hostiles. Kt-7 I want you on full alert.
